title: CSIRO Sonic fineness testers. Pt. 1
brief_description: Part one of a two-part series. Demonstrates two methods of measuring fineness, or the diameter of the fibre, in wool: in the laboratory using Sonic Fineness Tester Model A, and in the field using portable Sonic Fineness Tester Model B.
